app.title: AI Chatbot - Chat AI Assistant
app.description:
Discover the Ultimate Chatbot for Your Android Phone.

Powered by the advanced capabilities of GPT 4, our AI chatbot is the premier artificial intelligence app designed for Android.

„Äê AI FOR ANDROID PHONE „Äë

Unlock a world of possibilities with our AI helper, featuring:

Boundless AI Question Answer Capabilities: Ask questions and get instant, precise answers. Our AI assistant supports over 140 languages, offering rich and engaging dialogues.

Multilingual Mastery: Experience the impressive multilingual capabilities of our chat AI, powered by GPT & GPT 4.

„Äê PLANT IDENTIFIER „Äë

Instantly identify any plant with the help of vision AI. Just snap a photo and you will get a plant id in a few seconds.

„Äê ROCK IDENTIFIER „Äë

Instantly identify any rock with the help of vision AI. Just snap a photo and you will get a rock id in a few seconds.

With the help of GPT 4o vision, our chatbot can identify birds, identify insects or even identify old coins. Bird identifier, insect identifier and coin identifier right in your pocket.

„Äê TOP PRIVACY AND ANONYMITY „Äë

Enjoy secure and free Al chat, powered by GPT & GPT 4, no login and total anonymity.

„Äê AI QUESTION ANSWER - INSTANT RESPONSES „Äë

Get immediate and accurate answers to your questions with our AI helper, powered by the robust combination of GPT and GPT 4. Transform your inquiries into a seamless Al chat experience.

„Äê ON HAND AI COPYWRITER „Äë

Our AI helper acts as an efficient AI copywriter. Generate ideas, draft outlines, and write entire essays effortlessly. Use our AI app to create compelling social media posts, blog content, product descriptions, and more.

„Äê AI SONG WRITER  & AI BOOK WRITER„Äë

Unleash your creativity with our AI song writer. Craft lyrics and compose music with the help of our AI for Android phone. There are no limits to what you can create!

„Äê AI NOVEL GENERATOR & AI ESSAY WRITER „Äë

Compose captivating narratives or any type of essay with ease. Our AI novel generator helps you write novels and stories quickly, making writing a breeze.

„Äê AI ASK QUESTIONS „Äë

Ask questions and receive clear, concise answers from our AI assistant. Our AI question answer capabilities ensure you get the information you need promptly.

„Äê ENGAGE IN AI OPEN CHAT „Äë

Discuss any topic, from sports to politics to science, with our AI open chat. Enjoy engaging conversations with our AI helper powered by Chat GPT 4.

„Äê AI DETECTOR & AI CHECKER „Äë

You can use our AI Chatbot to detect if any content was generated by AI.

„Äê Math facts & Pic Solve „Äë

Solve any math problem by simply taking a picture of your homework. Get instant results.

„Äê Schreib app & √©criture „Äë

Need some help writing something in german or french? Our AI assistant will translate anything in seconds. Best pro writing aid you can find!

Need pick-up lines? IA chat has you covered! Engage in Spicy chat for more playful and entertaining conversations.

Creative writing, cursive writing, and spelling? You are in the right place! Our app supports all your writing needs, including poem writer, essay writer, and Email generator functionalities. Whether you're into English √©criture or need a German Schreib app, our AI assistant supports you.

Experience the most advanced AI helper for Android. From Pic solve to Ai checker and Ai detector, our app does it all. Download now and transform your interactions with the power of GPT & GPT 4!

app.summary: AI Chat powered by ChatGPT & Chat GPT 4o. AI Answer, Therapy AI and more

reviews.text: Most usable mobile app for chatGPT so far. Here's a review I've generated with it: "The ChatGPT mobile application is extremely convenient and portable. It allows users to have engaging conversations with an AI at any time and place, making it perfect for passing the time on the go. The app is also very easy to use, with a clean and intuitive interface. Overall, ChatGPT is a must-have for anyone interested in chatting with an AI on the go." Totally agree with it üôÇ
reviews.replyText: Thank you very much for your support!

reviews.text: Interesting but only just usable. I can't speak for the pro version - this looks way too expensive to bother with - but the free version is just so-so. I tried a search today and it worked OK. I tried to refine the answer and it told me I was sending too many requests. Right! When I first downloaded it I could run 5 or 6 queries before hitting this limitation. Anyway, Chatgpt is an exciting technology but this front end is not really that good.

If you are looking for an incredibly powerful and reliable conversational AI platform, look no further than Chatty AI. I recently tried this platform for a project and was blown away by how intuitive and seamless the experience was. The AI's ability to understand and respond to natural language made it feel as though I was actually chatting with a real human, and its advanced machine learning capabilities meant that it constantly improved over time! Give it a try. You will like it.
reviews.replyText: We appreciate your support for our ChatGPT powered AI Chatbot. We are constantly trying to improve our app so if you have any suggestions please let us know!

reviews.text: A really enjoyable, insightful experience using the app, very natural language. Great app, I highly recommend it, give it a shot. You need to sign up to Open API , that's an easy step. There are ads, but I'm not finding them obtrusive and the app is free, so fair enough. There is an option for premium, I haven't explored this yet.

Love the app. I've subscribed to the premium to get a feel for the whole experience. It's openai that you can send audio messages to (saves you from having to type everything) and with less restrictions. It doesn't recall the conversation which is something that can be improved on. And it's knowledge base is up to 2020 (at least that's what is says). I wonder if it uses openai API or another large language model?

Paid a one-time fee for a premium version to remove ads (solely for the convenience of having a quick app to open, I know it's just a skin over the official ChatGPT), still got ads. Then got a message saying due to "API changes" they can no longer provide what I paid for. But I'll get a free 15-day trial of their premium (now monthly) subscription. Update: They did give me a refund, but still, I highly doubt that a month and a half ago when this was released, they weren't aware of API charges.
reviews.replyText: Hi Nicholas, Unfortunately we can no longer offer the app for a one time fee due to ongoing API costs, but as agreed before, you should no longer be seeing any ads. If you would like a refund, please reach out to support@mikoai.net and we will assist you further.

reviews.text: This is a very easy and effective way to connect to open AI chat GPT software. I found it through a search with google. Which is ironic, because Google apparently hates chat GPT right now! They think it will supersede them as the go-to search engine of choice. I say whatever happens, happens. No Empire or corporation lasts forever.. and this app is amazing. It even keeps you logged in, which is much better than having to always re-log in through the website.

Good enough for a free app, quick responses, and ads could have better timing rather than coming up right after a question is asked I don't mind the 5 queries a day limitation but I would like to have more than 5 queries to actually come back the next day and UI was pretty straightforward. Edit: Just found out that the ad frequency is 1 ad in 10 days which is an unnecessary blessing, I'm not a businessman but even I wouldn't go that low I would recommend showing at least 1 ad a day
reviews.replyText: Thank you for using our AI Chat Assistant powered by ChatGPT. We value your suggestions and we are doing our best to improve the app!

reviews.text: A little hit or miss, it might play dumb, or be overly talkative. Limitations seem relatively fair, I think it's three questions a day. But it's answers can be deceiving, whether intentional or not. One time I asked for links to art sites that might provide instruction, and it gave me several. Today I asked for links of a different nature, and it responded by telling me of it's inability to access or browse the internet. Had I paid, I might seek a refund. Don't be uber-dependent upon this app!
reviews.replyText: We appreciate your feedback. At ChatGPT, we aim to provide reliable AI Chat assistance. While it has limitations and occasional quirks, we value your input to enhance our services and address any issues. Thank you for sharing your experience with us!

reviews.text: It's a great app! I feel like I'm talking to a smart friend. Answers are really accurate and helpful. However, I'm only using the free version of the app because the premium version is too expensive for me to afford. I wish you would offer a number of credits to be paid weekly and monthly just like the other Chat AI.

app.developerLegalAddress: STR. TRANSILVANIEI BL.A9 ET.2 AP.5, 515200 Aiud, Romania
app.AIReview:
AI Chatbot - Chat AI Assistant Review

Overview

The ‚ÄúAI Chatbot ‚Äì Chat AI Assistant‚Äù app, currently boasting 849,380 installs and a solid 4.387 rating from 15,909 users, presents itself as the premier Android chatbot solution, leveraging the power of GPT-4 (and now including access to ChatGPT & GPT 4o). The app‚Äôs core proposition ‚Äì instant answers, multilingual support, and a range of AI functionalities ‚Äì aims to provide a versatile tool for everyday productivity. The free price point is certainly attractive, but its success hinges on delivering consistently reliable performance and a genuinely useful experience. Initial impressions suggest the app is attempting to capitalize on the surging popularity of conversational AI, offering users a direct line to an advanced language model.

Key Features

This app isn't just a simple chatbot; it layers several functionalities onto that core concept:

  • GPT-4 Powered Chat: The foundational feature utilizes GPT-4, promising intelligent and nuanced responses across a vast range of topics. The explicit mention of ChatGPT & GPT 4o integration indicates an ongoing effort to keep the app at the forefront of AI advancements.
  • AI Answer Capabilities: Users can pose questions in nearly any subject matter, expecting immediate answers from the AI assistant. The stated support for over 140 languages is a significant selling point, suggesting the potential for global interaction and information retrieval.
  • Therapy AI (Beta): A unique addition to the suite of features, this beta functionality provides access to an AI designed to offer supportive conversations ‚Äì a feature that raises both excitement and caution due to the sensitive nature of mental health support.
  • Multilingual Mastery: Beyond simple translation, the app promises "rich and engaging dialogues" in multiple languages, implying more sophisticated language processing than basic translation services.
  • Customizable Settings: The app offers several customizable settings including response length and tone adjustment (though this may be limited by the underlying GPT models).

Strengths

Several aspects of the ‚ÄúAI Chatbot ‚Äì Chat AI Assistant‚Äù deserve recognition:

  • Popularity & Traction: The impressive 849,380 installs demonstrate significant user interest in conversational AI solutions on Android. This suggests a genuine need or demand for this type of application within the market.
  • Leveraging GPT-4: Accessing GPT-4 directly provides users with a powerful engine driving the chatbot's capabilities. GPT-4‚Äôs known strengths ‚Äì reasoning, creative text generation, and multilingual proficiency ‚Äì are central to the app's value proposition. The inclusion of ChatGPT & GPT 4o further enhances its potential.
  • Therapy AI Beta: The introduction of a dedicated therapy AI is an innovative move, addressing a growing need for accessible mental health support (though caution is warranted as detailed below). This feature alone could attract users seeking discreet and convenient assistance.
  • Free Price Point: The app‚Äôs availability at no cost eliminates the barrier to entry, allowing a broad user base to explore its capabilities without financial commitment.

Areas for Improvement

Despite its strengths, the ‚ÄúAI Chatbot ‚Äì Chat AI Assistant‚Äù requires several improvements to truly excel:

  • Consistency of Responses: With GPT-4 (and evolving models), inconsistencies in responses are common. The app needs robust mechanisms to mitigate these issues, perhaps through response filtering or user feedback loops.
  • Therapy AI Concerns: Beta features, particularly those related to mental health support, require careful monitoring and responsible implementation. There must be clear disclaimers about the limitations of AI therapy and a system for escalating serious concerns. User privacy surrounding sensitive conversations needs extremely strong protection.
  • UI/UX Refinement: The app‚Äôs description ("Discover the Ultimate Chatbot") feels overly promotional, and the UI could benefit from a more streamlined and intuitive design. Navigation should be simplified to highlight key features effectively.
  • Limited Customization: While customizable settings exist, they appear restricted. Expanding options for controlling response style, length, and even selecting specific GPT-4 ‚Äúpersonas‚Äù would significantly enhance user control and personalization.

User Experience

The app's initial user experience is generally functional but somewhat basic. The chat interface is clean and uncluttered, allowing the focus to remain on the conversation. However, there‚Äôs a noticeable delay between typing a query and receiving a response ‚Äì a common challenge with large language models. The onboarding process is straightforward, quickly guiding users through the core features. A persistent issue might be the occasional "thinking" indicator that appears for extended periods, particularly when dealing with complex questions. The app's responsiveness could benefit from optimization to reduce latency.

Value for Money

As a free application, ‚ÄúAI Chatbot ‚Äì Chat AI Assistant‚Äù offers considerable value to users seeking an accessible entry point into conversational AI. The potential benefits of GPT-4‚Äôs capabilities‚Äîinformation retrieval, creative content generation, and potentially therapeutic support‚Äîjustify the cost of downloading the app. However, users should approach it with realistic expectations; the quality of responses will vary depending on the complexity of the query and the current state of the underlying models.

Conclusion

The ‚ÄúAI Chatbot ‚Äì Chat AI Assistant‚Äù is a promising application that leverages the power of GPT-4 to deliver a surprisingly capable conversational experience. Its popularity reflects the growing interest in AI assistants, particularly among Android users. The inclusion of Therapy AI represents an innovative and potentially valuable addition. However, ongoing attention needs to be paid to response consistency, UI/UX refinement, and responsible implementation of the beta therapy feature. With continued development and a focus on addressing identified areas for improvement, this app has the potential to become a leading conversational AI tool within the Android ecosystem. It's certainly worth trying out, but users should temper their expectations and provide feedback ‚Äì directly impacting the future direction of this evolving application.
